916690.name: Need to Know - Official Soundtrack
916690.description:
Immerse yourself in the Department of Liberty

A luscious musical collection to accompany your monumental rise through the all-seeing Department of Liberty. Heart-pounding percussion, soulful brass and blazing synth thrust you through a rich audial tour of the missions and moments that make up your mass surveillance journey. Relive the pulsating manhunts, the deep-diving investigations, the slow burn mysteries, and the moments of intimate reflection in this diverse anthology.


All tracks can be downloaded either in high-quality MP3 files (320kbps) or lossless FLAC format.

Credits

  • Composer: Byron Son
916690.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
